CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1945, pg. 13 reads: "Prayer For Victory - On the V-E Day celebrated last Tuesday, Mrs. Arthur Taylor (left) of Webster Avenue, mother of Lieut. Elmer Taylor, first Pittsburgh colored flier killed in war, attended services at Grace Memorial Church .... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women singing and standing in pews, including Gold Star mother Mrs. Arthur Taylor in center, in Grace Memorial Church
